item.title: About Me
item.description:
Hey, I’m Aman! #

I’m a Master’s student at the University of San Francisco (USF),
with a deep interest in data-driven systems, algorithms, and distributed computing.

I work on large-scale data processing, geospatial analysis, and automation,
building tools that transform raw information into actionable insights.

This blog is a collection of my workâ€”deep dives into data-heavy applications,
complex systems, and the tech that powers them.
